content: in this legal case the court has ruled to dissolve a community inheritance and assign ownership of certain properties to the parties involved the court has also ordered a specific sum of money to be paid the judgment needs to be recorded in the real estate records and the payment must be made according to the civil code the case involves the heirs of a deceased person who requested the division of the inherited property the courtappointed expert witness provided a report and the plaintiffs offered to pay a certain amount after deducting expenses the court granted the dissolution of the community inheritance and assigned ownership of specific properties to the plaintiffs the plaintiffs must pay a settlement amount in a specific manner the court also decided that the costs of the case should be divided among the parties involved the court made a final ruling disregarding objections raised by the parties they ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance and assigned certain individuals to take ownership of various properties including an apartment and a garage a payment of €1080233 has been ordered unless the parties agree on a different amount the judgment must be recorded by the registrar of real estate records the defendant has been ordered to reimburse the plaintiffs for their legal costs including attorney fees and expenses this judgment was made on january 27 2017 in monza
